author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NEW TROPICAL STORM FORMS SOUTH-SOUTHEAST OF BERMUDA... ...EXPECTED TO REMAIN OVER THE OPEN OCEAN...
summary: ...NEW TROPICAL STORM FORMS SOUTH-SOUTHEAST OF BERMUDA... ...EXPECTED TO REMAIN OVER THE OPEN OCEAN... As of 5:00 PM AST Sat Aug 23 the center of Fernand was located near 27.2, -61.4 with movement N at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
